main event: A civilian reported sighting a red disc-shaped UFO with yellow lights in Marietta, Ohio on July 25, 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed for about ten minutes,The sighting involved an object that appeared to come from the direction of the constellation Hercules,The observer noted conflicting data about the object's course,The observer described the object as having glowing yellow lights and a red body,There was no physical evidence or photographs provided with the report.
sighted object: red disc-shaped UFO with yellow lights
